message: Electronic Geeks this Wireless Chip is a treasure for you ;) http://electricimp.com/product/ Mahmoud Abd El-Fattah Hossam Zain Mohammad Tayseer Mohamed El Sayed  Sample products using the wireless chip: https://lockitron.com/preorder
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: What is the imp?

description: A complete solution to connect devices to the internet, wirelessly.
